BOARD OF ZONING APPEAL
HEARING – REMOTE MEETING
~ AGENDA ~

Thursday, June 10, 2021

6:30 PM

Remote Meeting

BOARD OF ZONING APPEAL
City of Cambridge
Massachusetts
BOARD OF ZONING APPEAL
831 Mass Avenue, Cambridge, MA.
617) 349-6100
The Board of Zoning Appeal will hold a Virtual Public Meeting, THURSDAY - JUNE 10, 2021. Members of
the public can participate or view the meeting remotely using the Zoom Webinar link:
<https://cambridgema.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_NcNyR-ejToKfzmFibageZg>
Or join by phone: Dial +1 929 436 2866 or +1 301 715 8592 - Webinar ID: 843 1709 7972
6:30 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-116393
Residence C-1 Zone
14 BIGELOW STREET
REED SHEA
Variance: To construct a 2-story addition at the rear of house. Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional
Requirements).
Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.3 (Non-Conforming Structure).
Special Permit: To exempt the basement from GFA and to relocate/add windows and doors.
Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2.C (Non-Conforming Structure). Article 2.000, Sec. 2.16 (Definition of Basement FAR).
6:45 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-108452
45 BLANCHARD ROAD #1
Residence B Zone
BRIAN DEPORZIO, NICHOLAS DEPORZIO, TR. & KATLYN COVENEY
Variance: To allow to provide overnight, postoperative care in my home to 1 (one) canine at a time, in need
of this care.
Art. 4.000, Sec. 4.35.L (Veterinary Establishment, Kennel, Pet Shop or Similar Establishment).
7:00 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-117337
145 WILLOW STREET - UNIT 1
Residence C-1 Zone
145 WILLOW STREET LLC - C/O ANDREW PLUMB
Variance: To construct a new three-family dwelling within front, side, and rear yard setbacks. Art. 5.000,
Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements). Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.3 (Non-Conforming Structure). Art.
10.000, Sec. 10.30 (Variance).
Special Permit: Exempt the basement floor area from being included in the building's gross floor area and
reduce number of required parking spaces. At. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2.C (Non-Conforming Structure). Art. 6.000,
Sec. 6.35.1 (Reduction in Required Parking).
Art. 2.000, Sec. 2.16 (Definition of Basement FAR). Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40 (Special Permit).
7:15 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-117396
41 MAGOUN STREET

Residence B Zone

NEHEET TRIVEDI & KATE McGOVERN
Special Permit: To construct two shed dormers in attic, reconstructing and extending the existing deck three
feet, and modifying windows and a door in the side yard setback. Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional
Requirements). Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.1.D (Window Alterations), Sec. 8.22.2.C & Sec. 8.22.2.D (NonConforming Structure) & Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40 (Special Permit).

Board of Zoning Appeal

June 10, 2021

7:30 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-114770
8 DAY STREET
Residence B Zone
HAWTHORNE DEVELOPMENT VENTURES, LLC - C/O BRIAN LAVELLE
Special Permit: Alter existing and add new window openings within the side yard setback, enlarge an
existing third-floor dormer, and construct two bump-outs on the side walls of the building to accommodate
new fireplaces.
Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements). Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2.C & Sec. 8.22.2.D (NonConforming Structure).
Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40 (Special Permit).
7:45 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-117068
159 CHILTON STREET
Residence B Zone
CHARLIE LIU & PATRICE LIU - C/O JAMES J. RAFFERTY, ESQ.
Special Permit: To construct two story rear addition to accommodate an expanded rear entry with mudroom
and an enlarged bathroom on second floor to pre-existing non-conforming two-family dwelling. Art. 5.000,
Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements). Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2.D (Non-Conforming Structure). Art.
10.000, Sec. 10.40 (Special Permit).
8:00 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-117398
114 & 118-122 CLAY STREET Residence B Zone
DANIEL STAMOS & JANICE STAMOS - C/O JAMES J. RAFFERTY, ESQ.
Variance: To subdivide pre-existing lots that were unintentionally merged as the result of an acquisition by
adjoining property owner in 2008. Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements) Sec. 5.15
(Subdivision). Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.30 (Variance).
8:15 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-117680
114 CLAY STREET
Residence B Zone
DANIEL STAMOS & JANICE STAMOS - C/O JAMES J. RAFFERTY, ESQ.
Variance: Seeking relief from driveway setback requirements and parking aisle widths for proposed new
structure on proposed, subdivided lot at 114 Clay Street. Art. 6.000, Sec. 6.42 (Parking Aisle Widths). & Sec.
6.44.1 (Driveway Location).
Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.30 (Variance).
8:30 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-118920
40 LAND BOULEVARD
PUD-2
HPT CAMBRIDGE LLC - KRISTINA COTTONE, AT&T AGENT
Special Permit: AT&T proposes the following modifications on the existing telecommunications site; remove
(2) antennas, and install (2) new antennas, (6) new Remote Radio Units, and (1) DC Only Squid. The
proposed modification will not increase the height nor footprint of the existing wireless facility. Art. 4.000,
Sec. 4.32.G.1 & Sec. 4.40 (Footnote 49) (Telecommunication Facility).
Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40 (Special Permit). 6409 (Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act).
TO VIEW BZA CASE APPLICATIONS, PLANS & SUBMISSIONS, GO TO:
<https://www.cambridgema.gov/inspection/zoning.aspx> at top of page, click “Calendar” > Click hearing date >
Click “Board of Zoning Appeal Agenda.” Any information filed after the agenda has been posted can be viewed at
the Inspectional Services Department located at 831 Mass Avenue, Cambridge by appointment only. Copies of this
petition are also on file in the office of the City Clerk, City Hall, Cambridge, MA. Interested persons may provide
comments to the Board of Zoning Appeal by
participating virtually during the hearing and/or may provide written comments for the Board’s consideration by
mailing or delivering them to the attention of the Secretary, Board of Zoning Appeal,
831 Mass Avenue, 02139 or by emailing them to mpacheco@cambridgema.gov
<mailto:mpacheco@cambridgema.gov>. Comments must be submitted prior to the Hearing and include the Case
Number.
Continued cases are not re-advertised but are posted on the office board at the City Clerk’s Office in City Hall & on
the same BZA Web Page 48 hours prior to hearing.

City of Cambridge
